info.author: KEYSIGHT Technologies - IXIA Solutions Group
info.description:
IxNetwork REST API python client
================================
A python client that interacts with an Ixia Solutions Group IxNetwork test tool.
In order to use the REST feature the IxNetwork test tool must be version 8.x or higher.


JSON import/export/configure
--------------------------------
In order to use the json import/export/configure features the IxNetwork test tool must be version 8.31 or higher.


Session Management
--------------------------------
The IxnHttp class allows for connection to a single session when using the IxNetwork GUI.
It also allows for multiple session management when using the Linux based API server.
The following is an example of how to connect to a single GUI session:

# Standalone IxNetwork GUI session
# the ReST port can be found in the caption bar of the GUI session
# connect to the GUI session with ReST port 12345
ixnetwork_gui = IxnHttp.IxnHttp('10.200.22.48', rest_port=12345)
sessions = ixnetwork_gui.sessions()
for session in sessions:
    session.dump()
ixnetwork_gui.current_session = sessions[0]


Query
--------------------------------
The low level class IxnQuery allows access to the entire low level IxNetwork hierarchy.
It allows access to objects if the json feature is not yet available.
It dynamically builds objects based on the return of the query and the type of object.
Each object has .attributes, .operations and an update/delete method depending on the type of object.
Attributes are returned by specifying them in the properties list of the node.
The properties list supports regex so if you want all attributes returned specify properties=['*'].
The following is an example of how to get and change a topology's name using the query:

query_result = ixnhttp.root.query \
    .node('topology', properties=['name']) \
    .go()
topology = query_result.topology[0]
topology.attributes.name.value = 'IGMP/MLD Emulation Hosts Container'
topology.update()
info.name: ixnetwork
